translation.en: [Jade] Scientists said the world would end in 2036.
translation.zh: ‎科学家曾说世界会在2036年毁灭

translation.en: The air, you wouldn't be able to breathe it.
The world ended a long time ago.
translation.zh: ‎这个世界老早就灭亡了 ‎（伦敦 2036年）

translation.en: I remember when I was nine. My sister and I, we, uh…
translation.zh: ‎我记得我九岁时 我姐妹跟我…

translation.en: Oh, it's, uh… It was a pretty fun place.
[Arjun] Uh, Bea, uh, why don't you go get your present to show Mom, huh?
translation.zh: ‎碧雅 去拿你的礼物给妈妈看看吧？

translation.en: -[Bea] I'll be right back! -What kind of a book?
When I left, she was still working her way through Wrinkle in Time.
translation.zh:
‎我离开时
‎她还没看完《时间的皱折》

translation.en: Well, it's been six months. Things change.
translation.zh: ‎已经过了六个月 人事已非

translation.en: -Oh, hey, I… I didn't mean… -No, it… It's fine.
translation.zh:
‎-嘿 我的意思不是…
‎-不 没关系

translation.en: I know I've been gone too long. I miss you guys so much.
translation.zh: ‎我知道我离开太久了 ‎我很想你们

translation.en: [Jade] Pack 2426 still shows no sign of leadership structure
♪ If they listen through the wall ♪ ♪ The wall, the wall? ♪
♪ You don't really need a break ♪
Shit. Stop. [Albert] I really think you guys are gonna love it here.
translation.zh:
‎-靠 别闹了
‎-我真的觉得你们一定会喜欢这里

translation.en: Oh, and the school, they have an amazing STEM program.
translation.zh:
‎对了 学校有很棒的
‎科学、技术、工程和数学教育课程

translation.en: Their team won Codefest last year, and…
translation.zh:
‎他们的团队
‎拿下去年程序设计节冠军 而且…

translation.en: Hey, did you see those freaks in the park?
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你看到公园那群怪胎了吗？

translation.en: Oh, you mean the normal people? Like, walking around?
translation.zh: ‎你指的是四处走动的正常人？

translation.en: [young Billie] Yeah, I saw them. They looked fine.
translation.zh: ‎对 我看到了 他们看起来很正常

translation.en: And we're in South Africa, but there's only, like, five Black people?
translation.zh: ‎这里是南非 黑人却寥寥可数？

translation.en: -[young Billie] The house is nice though. -[young Jade] Yeah.
If I burn it down, can we go home?
translation.zh:
‎如果我放火把房子烧了
‎我们就可以回家了吗？

translation.en: -Ah! There you are. -[Albert] Carol, good to see you again.
translation.zh:
‎-你到了
‎-卡萝 很高兴又见面了

translation.en: Jade, Billie, it's terrific to finally meet you.
translation.zh: ‎洁德跟比莉 很高兴终于见到你们了

translation.en: [Carol] You're going to absolutely love it here.
Once you've settled, I'll take you for a tour around the town center.
translation.zh:
‎等你们安顿下来
‎再带你们去镇中心走走

translation.en: I hope you love cupcakes. We have five shops, and two are vegan.
translation.zh:
‎希望你们爱吃杯子蛋糕
‎这里有五间店 其中两间是全素的

translation.en: [Carlol] I know the place is a little smaller than what you're used to,
translation.zh: ‎我知道这里比你们习惯的空间小

translation.en: but Cape Town's just an hour away.
translation.zh: ‎但开普敦离这里才一小时路程

translation.en: And, you know, last year, we were voted best place to live in the world.
translation.zh:
‎而且我们去年
‎获选为世上最佳居住环境

translation.en: Guys, that jerk off to CrossFit?
So, on behalf of the Umbrella Corporation, welcome home.
translation.zh: ‎所以呢 ‎谨代表保护伞公司 欢迎回家

‎-也太差劲了吧
‎-棒极了 好棒的房子

translation.en: New Raccoon City used to be an old factory town.
translation.zh: ‎新浣熊市以前是个老旧的工业城

translation.en: When Umbrella bought it, it was almost deserted.
translation.zh: ‎保护伞买下来时这里已经几乎废弃

translation.en: But with a little inspiration and a lot of hard work, well…
translation.zh: ‎但是神来几笔、努力建设 结果…

translation.en: The sun's a little brighter, the air's a little cleaner.
translation.zh: ‎阳光更耀眼 空气更干净

translation.en: You can have a house with all the latest bells and whistles.
And plenty of room to run and play.
translation.zh: ‎也有许多空间可以奔跑跟玩耍

translation.en: I mostly just read Zootopia porn, so…
translation.zh:
‎我大多都在看《疯狂动物城》的
‎色情同人创作 所以…

translation.en: No, I… I've been trying to work.
translation.zh: ‎不是的 我一直在找时间工作

translation.en: [Carol] Well, Saturdays are usually my cheat days, but…
translation.zh: ‎周六通常是我的放纵日 但…

translation.en: [sighs] What the heck? We're celebrating, right, girls?
translation.zh:
‎谁在乎呢？
‎我们要庆祝 对吧 两位？

translation.en: Who wants a slice of ca…
The bitch act. Not an act.
translation.zh:
‎-故意找碴
‎-我可不是装出来的

translation.en: [young Billie] Do you think I wanna be here?
I mean, you were fine with moving.
And what was I supposed to do?
Yell and scream and break a plate?
-I mean, it worked for me. -No, it didn't.
What happened to the chick that stole that beer?
That broke into bio and let the frogs go?
translation.zh: ‎那闯进生物教室放走青蛙的女孩？

translation.en: -She almost got expelled. -She got fucking boring.
translation.zh:
‎-她差点被退学
‎-她变得好无趣

translation.en: You know, sometimes, it's not so bad to just… get along.
translation.zh: ‎有时跟别人好好相处也不错

translation.en: [young Jade] I mean, at least the guys are hot.

translation.zh:
‎-去跟他们打声招呼吧
‎-不行 我太无趣了

translation.en: -Billie, I'm sorry. Okay? Come on. -No, it's fine. I need to unpack.
translation.zh:
‎-比莉 对不起 好吗？拜托
‎-不 没关系 我得整理行李

translation.en: -Hi. -I just moved in down the street.

translation.zh:
‎-只是想来跟你们打声招呼
‎-好

translation.en: [young Jade] Hi, nice to meet you.
-That's one big old bastard. -Check the camp. The girl.
translation.zh:
‎-好巨大的怪物
‎-去确认营地跟那个女孩

translation.en: [Maskey] There's gotta be 40 zeros over there.
But it going off, must have woke that fucker up.
translation.zh: ‎可是启动喷火器一定唤醒了那只怪物

translation.en: How much does she hate me?
The move, I know it's hard, but…
I didn't really have a choice.
-I don't have to pick it up. -If you don't, you'll stress.
translation.zh:
‎-我不一定要接
‎-你不接的话压力会很大

translation.en: I don't want excuses. We have protocols.
translation.zh: ‎少给我借口 照规定行事

translation.en: -[young Jade] You forgot my sample. -[Albert] Hold on.
-You took that yourself? -[young Jade] I can work a needle.
translation.zh:
‎-你自己抽的？
‎-用针筒抽血很难吗？
‎我以后一定很会施打海洛因

translation.en: We have never been sick, ever.
-But still, every two weeks, blood test. -He's just…
translation.zh:
‎可是每两周… ‎-都要验血
‎-他只是…

‎-脑袋不灵光 但是很帅
‎-好吧

‎-换了新的学校
‎-一切都很陌生
‎那又如何？我们可以重头来过

translation.en: I mean, these kids in this shitty town. We're gonna own them.
translation.zh: ‎这座烂城市的小鬼一定会被我们收服

translation.en: No, I don't… I just want to be invisible.
translation.zh: ‎不 我不…我只想当隐形人

translation.en: Is this because of the frog thing?
No, and the… The other thing.
Two, Alex Ingles kicked a first grader. So you broke his leg.
translation.zh: ‎再来 艾力克斯英格斯踹了一年级生 ‎你才打断他的腿

translation.en: -[young Jade] Fair trade. -I had to go to counseling.
translation.zh:
‎-很公平啊
‎-我还得去做心理咨询

translation.en: You know, and everyone thought I was psycho.
I need to stop getting mad and then doing stupid shit.
translation.zh: ‎我得克制自己的脾气 ‎不要再做蠢事

translation.en: [young Jade] You are nice and cool.
translation.zh: ‎你心地善良 是个很酷的人

translation.en: You've got a great ass, a 1520 on the PSAT.
translation.zh: ‎你有翘臀 ‎初步学术评估测试考了1520分

translation.en: And you've got the best sister.
So remember that and say "fuck it" to everything else, okay?
translation.zh:
‎记住这一点
‎其他的事都不必在意 好吗？

translation.en: I mean, same dad, but our moms, we had different egg donors,
translation.zh:
‎同父 但异母
‎我们的卵子是不同的人捐赠的

translation.en: but the surrogate delivered us at the same time.
My dad took me hunting last fall. It was awesome.
translation.zh: ‎我爸去年秋天带我去打猎 超好玩的

translation.en: [imitates gunshot] Shot Bambi in the brain.
You know, when the end of the world comes, we eat the vegans first.
translation.zh:
‎世界末日来临时
‎第一个会被吃掉的就是吃素的人

translation.en: -Hey, get off! Get off! -Up! Come with me!
translation.zh:
‎-喂 放开
‎-起来 跟我走

‎-走开 快滚
‎-出去 快点 ‎全部人退后

translation.en: -Don't make me throw something at you! -[Mrs. Morgan] Move back!
[woman] I was lethargic, unhappy, and unmotivated.
translation.zh: ‎我本来无精打彩的 ‎很不开心 毫无动力

translation.en: [man] A new product from Umbrella, where our business is life itself.
translation.zh:
‎保护伞隆重推出新产品
‎人生大小事就是我们分内的事 ‎（乐无忧）

translation.en: Joy helps people with serious issues, chronic depression, OCD.
translation.zh: ‎乐无忧帮助罹患重症的人 ‎慢性忧郁症与强迫症的的人
‎这是我研发这种产品的目的

translation.en: She lives in a great house, she's got a family,
-why is she taking pills? -We aren't doctors.
translation.zh:
‎-为什么要吃药？
‎-我们并不是医生

translation.en: It's not our job to ask that question.
translation.zh: ‎提出这种疑问不是我们的责任

translation.en: We're just giving people the tools they need to be happy.
translation.zh: ‎我们只是提供人们快乐所需的工具

translation.en: -We need to take a step back. -[Bob] We can't.
-With what's happening in Tijuana-- -We booked the ad buys.
translation.zh:
‎-蒂华纳出了那种状况…
‎-我们已经买了广告时段

translation.en: Eli Lilly made three billion a year off Prozac.
translation.zh: ‎礼来靠百忧解一年赚进30亿元

translation.en: We could double that in the first month.
translation.zh:
‎我们第一个月
‎就能赚到那个金额的两倍

translation.en: -[door closes] -Where the hell were you? Uh, here.
Then why weren't you picking up your phone?

translation.zh: ‎比莉 让我进去 拜托

translation.en: Jade, tell me what's going on.
translation.zh: ‎洁德 快告诉我是怎么回事

translation.en: [young Jade] Why didn't you just sit with me?
I don't give a fuck about those assholes.
[young Jade] The only person I care about is you.
You know what you have to do.
-The fight, it was… It was my fault. -[young Jade] No.
You have to go at her.
Why, so everyone can think I'm psycho again?
-I mean, they… they think-- -They're laughing at you.
And you need to shut them the fuck up.
[reporter] Papal States move to wall off Sicily.
translation.zh: ‎教宗国开始在西西里四周筑起围墙
‎阿拉斯加最后的自治区沦陷
‎而我们专利的生物纳米机器人科技

translation.en: stops 99.99 percent of known cancers in their tracks.
translation.zh: ‎阻止了99.99%已知的癌症病情恶化

translation.en: Available now from Umbrella, where our business is life--
translation.zh:
‎保护伞现正推出
‎人生大小事就是我们…

translation.en: -I'm Tate, by the way. -I need to get back to my camp.
translation.zh:
‎-对了 我叫泰特
‎-我得回我的营地

translation.en: We can make that happen… tomorrow.
There's still a lot of old tech around London.
translation.zh: ‎伦敦各地还有许多古老的科技

translation.en: The richies in Auckland and Oslo, they want it.
translation.zh: ‎奥克兰跟奥斯陆那群有钱人都想要

translation.en: We only take what we can trade.

translation.zh:
‎-你们怎么带我来这里的？
‎-直升机

‎-它在哪里？
‎-出去再次进行侦察

translation.en: One punch. Right in the tit.
translation.zh: ‎一拳就好 直接打在胸部上

translation.en: I… I should have just let it go.
[Roth] This is the last footage out of Tijuana.
translation.zh: ‎这是蒂华纳传出的最后一段视频

translation.en: [in Spanish] Why won't he die? Why?
translation.zh: ‎为什么怎样都打不死？为什么？

translation.en: [Roth in English] Six injured, three dead.
-Has anything gone public? -Nothing we can't handle.
translation.zh:
‎-外界得知消息了吗？
‎-我们都有办法应付
‎阿尔伯特 如果历史重演…

translation.en: ♪ It's interesting to justify the action ♪
-[Dave] She's psycho, okay? -[Mrs. Morgan] Mr. Isaacs…
translation.zh:
‎-她是疯子 好吗？
‎-艾萨克先生…

translation.en: -[Dave] She jumped my kid. -No, I didn't.
And these days, everyone gets a trophy, everyone's special, but…
translation.zh:
‎这个时代主张要奖励每个孩子
‎强调每个人都有独到之处 但…

translation.en: I don't know what your problem is here. Maybe the voices made you or… whatever.
translation.zh: ‎我不知道你有什么毛病 ‎或许是有幻听还是… ‎随便 都不重要

translation.en: It doesn't matter. We're pressing charges.
translation.zh: ‎随便 都不重要 ‎我们要提告

translation.en: You, you're gonna spend the next ten years in a cell!
[Mrs. Morgan] Mr. Wesker, thank you for coming.
translation.zh: ‎威斯克先生 感谢你过来一趟

translation.en: Sorry, I'm late. I got caught up. Work.
translation.zh: ‎很抱歉我来晚了 工作上抽不开身

translation.en: -[Mrs. Morgan] Mr. Isaacs was just saying… -I heard.
translation.zh:
‎-艾萨克先生正好提到…
‎-我听到了

translation.en: Now, I know that Billie has a history, but we're all part of the Umbrella family.
translation.zh: ‎我知道比莉过去曾经动粗 ‎但大家都是保护伞的一分子

translation.en: -I'm sure we can work this out. -You… threatened my daughter.
translation.zh:
‎-我们肯定能讨论出解决方案
‎-你… ‎威胁我的女儿

‎-不是的 我…
‎-你叫什么名字？

translation.en: What do you do for Umbrella, Dave?
translation.zh: ‎你在保护伞担任什么职位 戴夫？

translation.en: how many people can do your job, Dave?
translation.zh: ‎有多少人可以做你的工作 戴夫？

translation.en: [Albert] Well, I work for Umbrella, too.
And do you know how many people could do my job?
translation.zh: ‎你知道有多少人可以做我的工作吗？

‎-是喔 好吧 很棒吗？
‎-一点也不棒

translation.en: It means I work too much. It means…
translation.zh: ‎这代表我工作过度 也代表…

translation.en: I'm not much of a father. I try, but…
translation.zh: ‎我没善尽父亲的职责 我很努力 但…

translation.en: [scoffs] Okay, but what… What does this--
translation.zh: ‎好 但这跟… ‎这也代表保护伞需要我 所以…

translation.en: And it means that Umbrella needs me. So…
translation.zh: ‎这也代表保护伞需要我 所以…

translation.en: what happens if I call the people that own this town?
translation.zh: ‎如果我联络这座城镇的所有权人呢？

translation.en: The people that pay you and me and her.
What happens if I call them and I say that I'm going to quit unless…
translation.zh: ‎要是我联络他们 扬言辞职 除非…

translation.en: I want it so that no tech company ever hires you.
translation.zh: ‎我希望你进不了任何科技公司
‎不用妄想去苹果电脑或谷歌

translation.en: I want PornHub to shred your resume.
what do you think they're going to do, Dave?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得他们会怎么做 戴夫？

translation.en: I… I'm not gonna call the cops. Okay? And, and, and you know…
translation.zh: ‎我不会报警的 好吗？而且…

translation.en: This… Never mind… This, this whole thing?
Mr. Wesker, this girl was attacked.
translation.zh: ‎威斯克先生 这个女孩的确遭受攻击

translation.en: -Then who did it? -Oh, I don't care.
-Dad, this is stu-- -Tammy, just shut up.
translation.zh:
‎-爸 这太扯…
‎-谭美 闭嘴

translation.en: you attacked my daughter twice. So… [sucks teeth]
translation.zh: ‎你攻击我女儿两次了 所以…

translation.en: I think you owe her an apology.
I'll… never do anything to you again.
translation.zh: ‎真的很抱歉 我… ‎不会再找你麻烦了

translation.en: I think Billie should take tomorrow off and call it a mental health day.
translation.zh:
‎我认为比莉明天应该请假一天
‎好好抚慰受创的心灵

translation.en: And I was thinking maybe you could come by the lab.
translation.zh: ‎我想或许你可以来实验室一趟

translation.en: [young Billie] I know what you did.
-Those zeros, how many are out there? -[Tate] It changes.
We got over a thousand last summer. Not sure why.
translation.zh:
‎去年夏天来了一千多个
‎不晓得为什么

translation.en: After about two or three years, the cornea is fried.
but their sense of smell it keeps getting better.
translation.zh: ‎但它们的嗅觉却越来越灵敏

translation.en: And in the summer, people stink.
-Smart fucking dead folks, huh? -[Jade] They're not dead.
translation.zh:
‎-真聪明 好样的死人 对吧？
‎-它们没死

translation.en: The T-virus doesn't kill people, it rewires their brains.
translation.zh: ‎T病毒不会杀死人 只会改变人的大脑

translation.en: All they want to do is eat and spread the virus.
translation.zh: ‎它们一心只想满足饥饿感跟传播病毒

translation.en: And when the T goes cross-species, it triggers rampant cell growth.
translation.zh:
‎T病毒跨物种传播后
‎就会引发细胞猛烈生长

translation.en: It makes animals big and mean and--
translation.zh: ‎动物会变得巨大凶猛 而且…

translation.en: Really fucking big and really fucking mean.
-What were you doing out there? -[Jade] My job.
translation.zh:
‎-你在外头做什么？
‎-那是我的工作

translation.en: I study zeros. Watch how they change, evolve.
translation.zh:
‎我专门研究原尸
‎观察它们的改变跟演化

translation.en: They will… because the virus will.
translation.zh: ‎它们会的 因为病毒会改变

translation.en: [Jade] If we're lucky, it'll get weaker, and the weaker it gets, the smarter,
translation.zh:
‎要是我们运气好
‎病毒会弱化 而病毒越是弱化 ‎原尸就会变得更聪明、更像人类

translation.en: the more human the zeros will become.
translation.zh: ‎原尸就会变得更聪明、更像人类

translation.en: [inhales deeply] We need to understand it. Them.
I get how to kill 'em. I'm good.
There's, what, 300 million humans left on this planet?
translation.zh: ‎地球人口只剩下三亿左右吧？

translation.en: I don't think you can kill them all.
So we have to learn how to live with them.
AIDS or Ebola or anything else that's trying to wipe out the human race.
translation.zh:
‎跟艾滋病毒、埃博拉病毒
‎或其他任何想消灭人类的病毒
‎而且原尸是人类制造出来的 所以…

translation.en: -I didn't make no fucking zero… -[liquid sloshing]
-[bottle thuds] -…and I didn't end the fucking world.
translation.zh: ‎我也不是世界末日的罪魁祸首

translation.en: And, uh, I guess you know about that. You're a survivor.
translation.zh: ‎你应该很清楚 你是幸存者
‎你是第一波的吧？你身上有刺青

translation.en: [Tate] You were in New Raccoon when the outbreak started.
translation.zh: ‎感染爆发时 你人就在新浣熊市

translation.en: When the sick hit Glasgow, my dad put me and my sister on a boat,
translation.zh:
‎疫情传到格拉斯哥时
‎我爸要我跟我姐妹赶快上船

translation.en: spent ten years in the Fair Isles while the world went to fuck.
translation.zh:
‎外头的世界灭亡时
‎我们在费尔岛待了十年

translation.en: But you? You were right in the thick of it.
translation.zh: ‎可是你呢？你当时就在最危险的地方

translation.en: It's not easy to talk about, I imagine.
translation.zh: ‎谈起这段过往一定让你很难过

‎-保护伞
‎-保护伞的人要来？为什么？

translation.en: They've got a bounty on survivors.
Turns out, you're their number one most wanted.
You have been granted a three-hour visitor pass.
translation.zh: ‎你获得三小时的访客通行时间

translation.en: So can you come take a seat here for a moment?
translation.zh: ‎先坐在这里等一下 好吗？

translation.en: Are you going to that thing this weekend?
translation.zh: ‎你周末要去参加那场活动吗？

translation.en: -[Carl] Yeah, it should be fun. -[Rhonda] Great.
translation.zh:
‎-对 应该会很好玩
‎-好极了

translation.en: [Carl] And I'm assuming you'll be there, obviously.
[Rhonda] What time are you thinking of making an appearance?
-Actually, could you give me a ride? -[Carl] Sure could…
-Thanks. -[Rhonda] I have your number, so I'll…
translation.zh:
‎-谢了
‎-我有你的电话号码 我会…

translation.en: At school, no one's laughing at you anymore.
And they don't think you're a psycho either.
Did you know Umbrella does animal testing?
translation.zh: ‎你知道保护伞在做动物试验吗？

translation.en: And they say they don't, but they do.
translation.zh: ‎他们表面上说没有 但明明就有
‎善待动物组织还颁奖给他们

translation.en: Today, at Dad's office, I saw these rabbits.
translation.zh: ‎我今天去爸的办公室看到了一群兔子

‎-然后呢？
‎-真令人作呕 这是不对的

translation.en: And I told you this place was fucked.
But… kind of not our problem.
And you said, you wanted them not boring, crazy, frog-stealing in my back.
translation.zh:
‎而且你希望我恢复过去那个
‎有趣、疯狂又会偷放青蛙的模样

translation.en: -So you wanna steal the rabbits. -If we can.
translation.zh:
‎-所以你想去偷那些兔子
‎-如果可以的话

translation.en: I just need to get pictures and put them online,
and let people see what's really going on.
-You think Dad will be okay with that? -I…
What happened to getting along? No stupid shit?
translation.zh:
‎你不是要跟别人好好相处？
‎不要再做蠢事？

translation.en: 'cause everything's automated, but the main gate is voice-activated,
translation.zh:
‎因为全部自动化
‎但大门是语音启动的

translation.en: You know how to get past security cameras?
translation.zh: ‎你知道要怎么避免被摄像头拍到？
‎不知道 可是上网查就好了

translation.en: [young Billie] The guy was, like, almost crying. [young Jade] Our Dad did that?
translation.zh:
‎-那个家伙都快哭了
‎-被爸逼哭的？

translation.en: The guy who wears socks to the beach.
Who talks about escape rooms for hours,
and whose password to everything is Spock21?
[Albert's voice] Hello, this is Albert Wesker.
translation.zh: ‎你好 我是阿尔伯特威斯克

translation.en: Now commencing your one hour after-hours pass.
translation.zh: ‎你下班后的一小时通行时间计时开始

translation.en: You don't wanna do this. You play with Umbrella, you lose.
translation.zh:
‎劝你别这么做
‎玩弄保护伞是没有胜算的

‎-毫无例外
‎-我不是在玩弄他们 ‎我只是刚好有他们需要的东西

translation.en: I just happen to have something they need.
translation.zh: ‎我只是刚好有他们需要的东西

translation.en: Then what the fuck do you want?
A life. I hand you over, and I get a pass to Umbrella territory.
translation.zh:
‎好好过活 ‎只要把你交出去
‎我就能前往保护伞的领土

translation.en: If they're hiding this, what else are they hiding?
translation.zh:
‎如果他们连这都隐瞒
‎他们还有什么不可告人的秘密？

translation.en: [young Billie] Oh, um, that computer, is it online?
-[young Jade] Billie! -No. I just need to get pictures.
translation.zh:
‎-比莉
‎-没关系 我只需要拍到照片

translation.en: -[young Billie] In here. Hurry. -[young Jade] Go, go, go.
♪ I've got the joy, joy, joy, joy Down in my heart ♪
♪ Down in my heart, down in my heart ♪
♪ I've got the joy, joy, joy, joy Down in my heart ♪
♪ Down in my heart to stay ♪
♪ I've got the peace That passes understanding ♪
♪ Down in my heart, down in my heart ♪
♪ I've got the peace That passes understanding ♪
♪ Down in my heart Down in my heart to stay ♪
translation.zh: ‎就在我心里 常驻我心里

translation.en: ♪ I've got the joy, joy, joy, joy Down in my heart ♪
♪ Down in my heart, down in my heart ♪
♪ I've got the joy, joy, joy, joy Down in… ♪
I just need to… Okay, okay.
-[Albert] Hello, this is Albert Wesker. -Play it again.
translation.zh:
‎-哈啰 我是阿尔伯特威斯克
‎-再播一次

translation.en: -You got this. -[Albert] Hello, this is Albert…
translation.zh:
‎-你没问题的
‎-哈啰 我是阿尔伯特…

translation.en: Billie, you need to wake up.
Billie, you need to wake up now.

translation.zh: ‎拜托 醒过来吧 拜托

translation.en: Your sister's been looking for you.
Stay the fuck away from me.
